sub_title: Executive consultant | Supply Chain Management | Change management
summary:
Building on more then 20 years of international logistic and operational experiences in several management positions I have started Logexma.
With Logexma I would like to use my experiences to help companies improving their logistic and operational processes. A special interest is to improve the communication between 3PL and shippers to create a better mutual benefit from their contracts.

For more information please check: www.logexma.com

treasury_media.title: Home
treasury_media.description: Dit is de samenvatting van de startpagina

profile_positions.description:
Interim management, consultancy and logistic management. 
Wide range of experiences in different branches and logistic area's.

Past example projects and interim jobs:
- European footprint study and implementation - Philips
- Logistic integration of acquired company with a special focus on barcoding - Medtronic 
- Warehouse move in Germany with special focus on hazardous materials - 3D Systems 
- European transport tender - 3D Systems
- Logistic integration for multiple DC's in Europe - Coty
- Interim accountmanagement function combined with improvement project - Rhenus CL
profile_positions.title: Managing consultant

profile_positions.description:
After Philips and TPV announced the creation the joint venture TP Vision (70% TPV and 30% Philips), I have taken the challenge to take the global distribution responsibility for the joint venture. The former Philips TV business has been brought into this joint venture.
Next to the day-to-day operational distribution responsibility for serving customers with the expected quality and costs, 2 additional projects have been managed.
First of all the distribution function has been disentangled from Philips and has been set up as stand alone department. A second projected has been to review the global distribution set up for TP Vision (Philips TV) as stand alone organization. As a result of a study done a project has been started to reduce the European stock points from 11 (shared Philips stock points) to 5 European TP Vision (Philips TV) dedicated stock points. This project will end in Q1 2014.
Both projects have been executed in time and within the budget without significant operational disturbances. 
The function is responsible for a budget of 65 million Euro, 31 direct reports and 12 functional reports.
profile_positions.title: Head of Global Distribution & Export Control

profile_positions.description:
In January 2010 Philips decided to bring all distribution functions in the sectors Lighting and Consumer Lifestyle into a corporate department, Philips Distribution Services. With this change my responsibility was extended with the Consumer Lifestyle distribution set up next to the already existing Lighting responsibility. 
The geographical area of responsibility remained the same.
profile_positions.title: Regional distribution director CEE & MEA

profile_positions.description:
In April 2009 Philips Lighting implemented a new organizational structure. Philips Lighting Distribution as internal service provider was dismantled and the logistic functions reported as from that moment directly to the Vice President " Order to Deliver". In this new structure the clusters Mid East and Africa were added to my responsibility. This included distribution centre in Dubai, Johannesburg, Cairo, Casablanca and Tangier. 
In this function I am member of the management team " Order to deliver" and responsible for the restructuring of the European distribution structure, including the integration of acquisitions. Another responsibility in the function is to act as representative for the sector Lighting in the project o to set up a cross sector shared service centre for physical distribution at Philips in the EMEA region. 

Projects:

Restructuring European distribution structure (responsible for warehouse and transport processes and implementation of Philips acquisitions)
Creation of corporate department physical distribution (responsible for sector Lighting)
Implement performance indicators in Mid East and Africa 
Implement activity based costing.
 
Results:

Cost reduction of 30% annually on outsourced warehouse in the U.K..
Made costs structures more flexible.
Managed decrease in activities, due to the economical down turn, budget neutral in the EMEA region. 
Increased employees satisfaction score 
Operational and financial indicators above target.
profile_positions.title: General manager

profile_positions.description:
After restructuring of the department integrated the site in Oss and Roosendaal in existing factory structures. New responsibilities for Mäntsälä (Fin) and Brackmills (UK). End responsible for the department's material handling and physical distribution. Development of strategy and logistical concepts / services connecting to the Philips Lighting strategy. Member of the management team Philips Lighting Distribution. Direct reports 14, indirect report's +/- 300 FTE's. Budget responsibility for +/_ 50 million Euro.   

Projects:

In sourcing material handling processes and physical distribution activities of a Philips Lighting factory in Finland.  
Restructuring material handling department in Roosendaal.
Implementation LEAN principles.

Results:

20% lower physical distribution costs central South Europe region.
Improved operational results including the new sites in Poland and Finland 
Lower operational costs in Finland and Poland.
Efficiency improvement in all sites
profile_positions.title: General manager

profile_positions.description: Within Philips Lighting Distribution I am responsible for Factory Distribution Western Europe (FD WE). FD WE offers their customers (Philips factories and sales organizations) logistic services as material handling, warehousing and distribution. FD WE has currently logistic responsibilities in the sides Roosendaal (The Netherlands), Oss (The Netherlands), Springe (Germany), Bratislava (Slovakia), Ketrzyn (Poland) and Mäntsälä (Finland) with a total of 175 employees.
profile_positions.title: General manager

company.name: Teca BV - international transport en forwarding company

profile_positions.company: Teca BV - international transport en forwarding company
profile_positions.description:
Member management team in European context and responsible for the development, implementation and maintenance of the quality system ISO 9001:2000 for 12 offices in Europe (Germany, U.K. Ireland, and The Netherlands) 
Managing local quality managers, 11 fte's and responsible for internal trainings. The function was combined with the function of logistic manager.

Projects:

Acquisition and implementation of several international customers. 
Implementation ERP system   
Implementing quality system 9001:2000

Results:

Improved turnover and turn over  /margin ratio 
Certification following ISO 9001:2000
profile_positions.title: Quality manager / Logistic manager

profile_positions.company: Teca BV - international transport en forwarding company
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for results, cost management and budgeting. Contact person for governmental institutes and employers organizations. Responsible for operations, warehouse and administration within the location Hoogerheide, 25 fte's.
Initiating, supporting and implementation of projects for international customers in the area of global physical distribution and stock management. 
Participating in the creation of service level agreements, responsible for fiscal representation, formulating KPI's, initiating improvement projects, implementing administrative and stock management systems, warehouse lay out and end responsible for budgets.
profile_positions.title: Logistic manager

profile_positions.description:
mapping logistic needs of customers and prospects and development of services. Build experiences with the integration and implementation of logistic concepts within multinationals.  
Build up experiences with service level agreements and the registration of data in connection with KPI's such as on time delivery, damages and claims and documentation.
profile_positions.title: Account manager

profile_positions.description: Managing customer base and via acquisition increase the number of customers. Selling office furniture, machines and supplies.
